ma putu anda matha wadi wi apahasuwen yuthuwa idiripasa wuwange urahis atharin apahasuwen chithrapataya narambauwemi...kathawa andi yannata wiya..sinamawa ma hata aluth athdakimak wuwada mema sinamapataya ma hata yam hurupurudu aakarayak danuni...ekwarama kathawata wijayage rupaya aa wita ee kumakdayi mata awabodha uni...me mita sathi dekakata pamana peradi thaththa wisin apata kiya denu labu kathawa wiya...ee ekdahas nawasiya asuwa dashakaye thiragatha wu wijaya kumaranathungayan ranga pa kumana ho sinamapatayak eda apa wisin narambauwemi..ehi nama ma hata mathakayak natha..samahara wita eya mamayi raja ho wena kumak ho wiya haka...eheth nichchiyatama mathakayak natha...malu pan kamin orenj barli bomin putu anda matha wedanawen hindimin eda chithrapatayak narambau bawath..eya eyita kaliyen thaththa wisin thaniyama gos narambaa pamina pasuwa apatath eya balannata yannata salaswu wagath pamanak mathakaye atha...aththenma ee dawaswala pawule aadayama gena aa pradhana aadayam margaya wu sillara kadaya dinak ho wasa dama pawula pitin sinamapatayak narambaimata yamata hakiyawak nathi heyin thaththa kalinuth..pasuwa apath eya narambau bawa pamanak mata pasu kalayaka awabodha wiya...eya etharamma dushkara kalayak wiya.eheth ee siyalu dushkaratha mada sinama patayak narambaimata tharam unak ammatath thaththatath thibima gana aththenma ma ada sathutu wemi...eyin pasuwa sinamawath samanga banduna katha kihipayakma mage atha..ee athara amathaka nowana siduwim boho atha..ee athara thura mewani kathada atha...ee kese wethath adatath sinama shalawakata gos balkaniye idiripasama pelehi wadi wi idiriye athi simenthi bammata kakul thaba gena rata kaju hapamin sinamapatayak narambaimata ma adath boho kotama aasa karami...
game rasa katha..oopa dupa ...

meka tikak diga kathawak...

eheth guruthwa tharanga palamuwarata soyaganimata hakiwuye 2015 wasarediya.bari barish, kip thron saha rinar weyis yana widyagnyayan thidenage soyaganima lokaya pudumayata path kala yayi swidana rajakiya widya akadamiye pradhani goran ke hansan pawasiya.rinar weyis 85, bari barish 81 saha kip thron 77 yana wayaswala pasuwethi.
niyama sandrana agayan mema parasaye yam thanakata watena athara upangawala ardha sannayaka magin balaporoththuwana gunanga laba gatha haki paridi sandranaya wenas karayi.
wasara 30 k pawathi yuddhayakin pasu nagi sitimata wera darana me mohothe apa siyalu dena ema aramuna sarthaka kara ganima sandaha wehesimata piyawara gatha yuthuya.
paradunu aya mehemayi..

mokada ee ape samanya pela karana kale .api gana ape demapiyan puduma bayakin kale gatha kale , hethuwa eka ahangama , kathaluwa wagema koggala predshayeth hamadama wage pilissunu mala siruru ..ee assen thamayi api pasalata giye .

mage anith blog eka dan masa ganak thisse hamadama wage yanawa.
eheth athithayata sapekshawa baluwita me wana wita janatha wimukthi peramuna sathuwa guwan widuli nalika saha pradhana puwathpath pawa thibenawa.
sama rajayakma pahe, wruththiya samithi sambandhawa kriyakarana andabala prathipaththiya nisa da, thathwaya awulen awulata yanawa wina, samathayakata pathwimak sidu nowe.
eeta wada lesi nadda.
wagakim rahitha lesa madhya hasirawima pilibandawa sirasa wetha pawathina chodana niwaradi karaganimata da eya iwahal wanu athi...

amerikawa, maha brithanyaya, kanadawa wani ratawal me thaththwayata muhuna dun athara durbhagyaya itha keti kalakin samahan kara ganimata samath wiya. 2001 sapthambar ekolaha praharayen amerikan aarthikaya durwala wanne yayi anawaki palawuna da eya ese wuye natha.
chaya pitapathak ho oba sathuwa nathnam nothariswaraya munagasi ohu sathuwa pawathina thewani pitapathe eki thorathuru laba ganima sudusuya.

mema bada wala dala washayen 65 adi ha adi 100 k gambauru saha mahal thunakin yuth karmantha shalawa gila ganna landi.

habayi aththa lokaye ehema wenne naha. 1994 wasaredi ethek keruna waradi hadagena idiriyata yawi kiyana pathuma pamanak nowe, ee waradi karapu ayata danduwam dewiya kiyana sithuwillath dahas ganakata thibuna.

koti sanwidhanayata erehiwa aarakshaka hamudawa diyath kala manushiya meheyumedi sebalun ha niladharin 29,000 k pamana marumuwata pathwu athara thawath 10,000 kata adhika pirisak aabadhitha thaththwayata pathwuha.ee aya sihipath karamin mema samarum uthsawaya pawathwenu athi.
boho wita sewa dayakayage palanayen thorawama thama pita patawena barak lesin eya thiranaya wanu atha.
